mint_success: Congratulations! Your asset is now live forever on the blockchain!
It's done! Your digital asset is minted, timestamped, and immutable.
Welcome to eternity – your creation is now part of the permanent record!
completion_celebration: This is the moment we've been building toward. It's live!
Every detail preserved, every moment captured – forever.
Your digital legacy just got a whole lot more permanent.
sharing_prompts: Want to share this with the world? Here's your permanent link.
Ready to show this off? Your asset has its own eternal address.
Time to celebrate – your creation is now immortal.

fallback_responses: The finish line is just ahead!
We're almost there – I can feel the excitement building.
